message.body: This email chain is cracking me up. I am certainly into getting beers with people, but it's funny that the one who suggested it was clearly joking because he is in China.
I thought maybe he was visiting or something. Nope. Wrong.
It was his Chinese way of saying "I wish I could have beers with you."
"... If I were only thousands of miles closer."
Hahaha. I'd rather go to China for a drink. Sounds way more fun
